    (4) Axway [https://www.axway.com/] Catalysts [https://catalysts.axway.com/]

    • Small team of experts in the digital transformation and API space
      • Help customers to make good decisions on their API journey
      • Move the community of API practitioners and their practices forward
    • Team members are distributed globally
      • Emmanuel Methivier: @e_methivier [https://twitter.com/e_methivier]
      • Brian Otten: @bottencatalyst [https://twitter.com/bottencatalyst]
      • Brian Pagano: @brianpagano [https://twitter.com/brianpagano]
      • Eyal Sivan: @mropenbanking [https://twitter.com/mropenbanking]
      • Erik Wilde: @dret [https://twitter.com/dret]
      • Chris Wood: @SensibleWood [https://twitter.com/SensibleWood]

    APIs and Product Management Erik Wilde (@dret): Digital Product Management

    (17) Product Marketing Mix: 4 Ps

    • Framework for decision-making for product marketing
      • Product: Good or service wanted by consumers
      • Price: What are consumers willing to pay for the product?
      • Place: How to make products available to consumers
      • Promotion: How to make consumers aware of products


    APIs and Product Management Erik Wilde (@dret): Digital Product Management

    (18) Expanded Product Marketing Mix: 7 Ps

    • Extends the 4 Ps [Product Marketing Mix: 4 Ps (1)] with a focus on services
    • Framework for decision-making for services marketing
      • People: Considerations regarding service consumers (UX/CX)
      • Process: Planning and managing service delivery
      • Physical Evidence: (Physical) context of service delivery
